wikipedia_page.main: Alisha Butchers (born 14 June 1997) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays either flanker or back-rower for Bristol Bears Women and the Wales women's national rugby union team. She made her debut for the Wales rugby union team in 2016 and has played in 29 matches for the national side. Butchers scored her first international try that same year in a Women's Six Nations Championship victory over Scotland. She works as an Active Young People Officer and a Girls' Hub Officer while continuing her rugby career.
